        public static IFrameworkController createInstance(AbstractModule module,
                                                  Launcher.StartingOption... startingOptions)
        Creates and starts a new ZMF instance and uses default configuration file.
        Parameters:
        module - the module to start
        startingOptions - Starting options for ZMF
        Returns:
        the framework controller for this framework instance if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if fails to create instance

        Parameters:

      • createInstance

        @Deprecated
public static IFrameworkController createInstance(AbstractModule module,
                                                              boolean trackModuleStates,
                                                              boolean moduleAutoEnable,
                                                              boolean exitWhenEnableFail,
                                                              boolean peerDiscoveryWait)
        Deprecated. use createInstance with StartingOptions
        Creates and starts a new ZMF instance and uses default configuration file.
        Parameters:
        module - the module to start
        trackModuleStates - deprecated - will be ignored
        moduleAutoEnable - If true tries to enable the module as soon as possible
        exitWhenEnableFail - If true will exit if module enabling fails
        peerDiscoveryWait - If true the peer discovery will wait until all active modules discovered
        Returns:
        the framework controller for this framework instance if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if fails to create instance

      • createInstance

        @Deprecated
public static IFrameworkController createInstance(AbstractModule module,
                                                              boolean trackModuleStates,
                                                              boolean moduleAutoEnable,
                                                              boolean exitWhenEnableFail,
                                                              boolean peerDiscoveryWait,
                                                              boolean disableEqualModuleInterconnect,
                                                              java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> configPath)
        Deprecated. use createInstance with StartingOptions
        Creates and starts a new ZMF instance
        Parameters:
        module - the module to start
        trackModuleStates - deprecated - will be ignored
        moduleAutoEnable - If true tries to enable the module as soon as possible
        exitWhenEnableFail - If true will exit if module enabling fails
        peerDiscoveryWait - If true the peer discovery will wait until all active modules discovered
        configPath - Path to the user defined config file
        Returns:
        the framework controller for this framework instance if successful
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if fails to create instance
